product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Adapter, USB Cable, SIM Card Tool, Screen Protect Film, Case, Important Info Booklet with Warranty Card, Quick Guide
product_specification.Other Display Features: 90 Hz Refresh Rate, 20:9 Aspect Ratio, 90.5% Screen-to-Body Ratio, 180 Hz Maximum Touch Sampling Rate, Screen Contrast: 1500:1 (Typ), Brightness: 480 nits (Typ), 600 nits (Max), Color Saturation: 96% NTSC (Typ), COG Sealing Process
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Rear Camera Setup: 48MP Primary (Samsung S5KGM1ST, f/1.8 Aperture, 1/2 Inch Sensor Size, FOV: 79.8 Degree, Focal Length: 25.4mm, 6P Lens, 0.80um Pixels, PDAF) + 2MP Portrait (Galaxycore GC02M1B, f/2.4 Aperture, 1/5 Inch Sensor Size, FOV 88.8 Degree, Focal Length: 21.9mm, 3P Lens, 1.75um Pixels, FF) + 2MP Macro (OV OV02B10, f/2.4 Aperture, 1/5 Inch Sensor Size, FOV 88.8 Degree, Focal Length: 21.9mm, 3P Lens, 1.75um Pixels, 4cm FF), CMOS Sensor, EIS
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16MP Front Camera (Samsung S5K3P9SP04, f/2.1 Aperture, FOV: 79.3 Degree, Focal Length: 25.6mm, 1/3.1Inch Sensor Size, 1.0um Pixel Size, 5P Lens, FF, EIS)
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear Camera: 720p/1080p (at 30 fps), Slo-mo Video: 720p (at 120fps), EIS: 1080P (at 30 fps), Digtal Zoom Mode: 1080P (at 30 fps), Front Camera: 720p/1080p (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Magnetic Induction Sensor, Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Gyro-meter, Acceleration Sensor
product_specification.Other Features: UFS 2.1 (at 2 Lanes HS-Gear3) ROM, OTG Storage Formats: VFAT exFAT, NTFS, PD (9V/2A) 18W Max Charging Power, Side Fingerprint, Phone Lock Functions: Face Unlock, Fingerprint Unlock, Password Unlock, Pattern Unlock, Google Smart Lock, Fingerprint Unlock Speed (392ms), Wet Fingerpringt Unlock, Face Unlock Speed (713ms), Number Identification, File Encryption, Private Space, Private Apps, Private Protection, Headphones Monitor, Clone Apps, Kids Space, Voice Wake Up, Night Shiled, Step Tracker, Game Space, APP Market, Theme Store, Clone Phone, Phone Manager, Wallet, Google Lens
product_specification.Audio Formats: MP3, AAC, APE, AMR, WAV, OGG, FLAC, WMA
product_specification.Video Formats: AVI, 3GP, MP4, WMV, MKV, MOV, ASF, FLV
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty for Mobile and 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.700 5G Processor: This mobile phone features a 700 5G processor that enables low power consumption, powerful performance, and low heat as well. With a high clock speed, you can enjoy moving from task to task without lags.
product_description.Dual 5G: This mobile phone features a 5G Dual-SIM Dual-standby technology that allows you to use two 5G SIM cards simultaneously. Thanks to the Smart 5G technology, your phone can conserve battery power by automatically switching from 4G to 5G.
product_description.Slim and Light Mobile Phone: The realme 8 5G has a slim and lightweight design that makes it comfortable for you to hold and use it. It is constructed with lightweight yet strong materials so that you can enjoy easy and reliable usage.
product_description.Ultra Smooth Display: Thanks to the 16.5 cm (6.5) FHD+ Display and smooth refresh rate, your eyes will be treated to mesmerising and smooth visuals on the large screen. Your experience will be smooth as it has an optimal touch sampling rate.
product_description.Powerful Battery: This mobile phone is equipped with a massive battery with a 5000 mAh capacity to give you long-lasting usage and standby time. This way, you can use your phone without having to look for a charger every few minutes.
product_description.48 MP Nightscape Camera: With the 48 MP Nightscape triple camera, you can take beautiful photos of the scenery in front of you, in high resolution. Thanks to the numerous pixels, you’ll be able to capture fine details in your photos.
product_description.Super Nightscape: The Super Nightscape mode of this mobile phone can be used to take bright and dynamic photos in the night. You can make use of the cool night filters to include an extra dimension to the pictures you take in the night.
product_description.16 MP AI Selfie Camera: You can use the 16 MP In-display Selfie Camera along with its AI Beauty, AI Portrait, and other features to take eye-catching selfies of yourself and your loved ones.
product_description.Instant Side Fingerprint Sensor: This mobile phone includes a side-fingerprint sensor that is reliable and enables quick and easy unlocking.
product_description.Memory Expansion: The realme 8 5G can support up to two Nano-SIM cards and one MicroSD card at the same time, enabling convenient usage. It also supports memory expansion so that you have enough storage space for all your memories and more.
product_description.realme UI 2.0: Thanks to Android 11, you can experience the thrill of the realme UI 2.0 as it comes with connectivity, customisations, and more upgrades.

Pros :

1. It is future ready - already has 5G support
2. Reasonably priced
3. Big screen - 6.5", big storage (128 GB) and big battery - 5000mah
4. Type C charger 18W, better than microUSB but could have been better as far as 18W is concerned
5. 3.5 mm jack is there for wired earphones/headphones
6. The box already has back cover and seems 1 layer of screen protection is also there.
7. Camera clarity is good both selfie and back camera - haven't explored features like macro, slowmo, panorama etc yet as phone purchased few days back only

Cons:

1. No FM radio

pros.5000 mAh Battery: The 5000 mAh battery gives good backup and a long lasting performance.
pros.16.5 cm (6.5) FHD+ Display: The FHD+ display quality is smooth with a high refresh rate.
pros.Camera: Camera quality is good in this price budget.

cons.Performance: The 700 5G processor is slow and gives average performance. There are some hanging issues as well.

summary.verdict: The realme 8 5G is a decent purchase in this price segment.
summary.Additional Information: 2 hours 30 minutes for full charge, C-type charger.
